pages.text: $(li)The Duckweed is a block that can be found over the water of the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/swamp/swamp)Swamps$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/water/marsh)Marsh$(/l) of the Overworld.$(br)$(li)This item can be used to attrack $(l:patchouli:creatures/environmental/duck)Ducks$(/l) and breed them too.
$(li)It can only be obtained breaking it while you are holding a pair of $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/shears)Shears$(/l) in your hand.
